search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Filevine (filevine.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Filevine is: [https://www.filevine.com/pricing](https://www.filevine.com/pricing).

extracted_content.content:
Filevine Pricing
----------------

All packages are custom built for your firm's needs. Here are some ideas to get you started.

*   [Choose Your Plan](https://www.filevine.com/pricing#base-software)
*   [Enhancements](https://www.filevine.com/pricing#additional-products)

### Complete Your Tech Stack

*   Case management
*   Contact management
*   Calendar (Gmail & Outlook integration)
*   Email management (Gmail & Outlook integration)
*   Deadline management
*   Task management
*   Matter stages
*   Conflict Checker
*   SidebarAI Chat
*   Unlimited storage
*   Document management
*   Time tracking and billing
*   Payment processing

### Complete Your Tech Stack

*   Everything in Basic PLUS
*   eSignature
*   Fax
*   Custom sections
*   Doc gen

### Complete Your Tech Stack

*   Intake
*   eSignature
*   AI Document Review
*   DemandsAI
*   Contract lifecycle management
*   Filevine University

### What's Included

*   Lead Forms
*   Automations
*   Intakes
*   Lead Tracking
*   Marketing Source Optimization
*   Reporting
*   Enterprise-Level Security

### What's Included

*   Unlimited Signatures
*   Multi-Sign
*   Enterprise-Level Security

### What's Included

*   Template Creation
*   Team Management
*   Granular User Permissions
*   Customized Workflows
*   Reporting, Metrics, & Dashboards
*   Clause Library
*   No-Code Conditional Logic
*   Template Layout Styling
*   Contract Generation & Storage
*   Native eSigning
*   Real-Time Redlining, Editing, Commenting
*   Email Notifications
*   Version Controls
*   OCR
*   File Import + Export
*   Deadline Reminders

Get More from Your Plan
-----------------------

[DemandsAI streamlines demand letter creation using your case data and AI drafting, cutting down on data entry, errors, and time.](https://www.filevine.com/demands-ai/)[Our innovative AI tools for legal professionals streamline workflows, improve accuracy, and deliver valuable insights.](https://www.filevine.com/platform/ai-features-and-solutions/)[Scan and extract key details, compile crucial information, assist with USCIS forms, and track your client's form completion progress.](https://www.filevine.com/platform/immigrationai/)[Unbeatable document management with unlimited storage.](https://www.filevine.com/platform/document-management/)[From intake to settlement and everything in between, Vinesign makes eSignatures intuitive, effortless and instantaneous.](https://www.filevine.com/platform/esignature/)[Complete intake solution to help scale your firm.](https://www.filevine.com/platform/intake-and-lead-tracking/)[](https://www.filevine.com/depo-copilot/)

Compare All Plans
-----------------

Here are some examples of how firms have built their packages. As your firm expands and grows, so can you.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Our pricing is based on the number of users you require, as well as any special feature add-ons, integrations, or additional products. Each organization is unique and our team will work closely with you to tailor a cost-effective and scalable plan for your organization.

Our robust ecosystem of Certified Implementation Partners works with you to efficiently get your firm up and running in Filevine. Our partners have handled hundreds of implementations for law firms, legal teams, and organizations and can help you customize Filevine to fit your team’s unique workflows.

Filevine’s Customer Success and Support teams will provide ongoing support, guidance, and help as you navigate the Filevine Platform.

No. Filevine offers unlimited guest access to Filevine.

Filevine utilizes best-in-class compliance, privacy, and security programs to protect your data. Filevine is hosted on AWS, the world’s most secure cloud platform, with over 200 data centers globally.

Yes! We understand that choosing the right legal software is a big decision. That's why we offer a free trial of Filevine, so you can experience its powerful features and see how it can transform your practice before committing to a subscription.

**During your free trial, you can:**

  

  
*   Simplify your legal workflows with centralized case management.
  
*   Enjoy unlimited document storage and easy access to all your files.
  
*   Streamline client communication and task management in one platform.
  
*   Effortlessly track time, generate invoices, and collect payments.
  

**Start Your** [**Free Trial Today**](https://www.filevine.com/free-trial/)

Contact our sales team for a custom quote
-----------------------------------------

Every law firm, legal team, agency, and business is unique. We’ll help you identify a solution and price that is tailored to help your organization succeed.

[Get a Demo](https://www.filevine.com/demo-request/)

What does Filevine's Pricing include? We offer a suite of products to fit your specific needs. Compare all of our Products.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Filevine offers custom-built packages tailored to the needs of each firm. Pricing details are not explicitly listed on the website.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes basic case management and document management features.
features: UTBMS coding and 1998B for LEDES billing

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all Standard features plus advanced document management and AI tools.
Allows selection of individual features as needed.

additional_fees.fee_description: Visa, Mastercard, Discover: 2.94% + $0.20/transaction. American Express: 3.75% processing + $0.20/transaction. ACH $2/transaction.
